shortAppName.description: The short name of the extension

appDesc.message: Cette extension modifie l'Intranet de 42, changeant le thème clair en un thème sombre

aguWarning.message: Please disable the Dark Theme for Intra 42 extension before continuing. I did not test the pages after clicking the SET-UP-button and it is highly likely they will contain errors, which might result in a wrongfully allocated freeze.
aguWarning.description: The warning displayed on the A.G.U. Panel page in settings. Currently unused due to bugs: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=115800
